Posted By: Keith OLeary
5.00 priority mail shipping. Emails addressed in order receieved Snoopy525@Embarqmail.com">Snoopy525@Embarqmail.com> 
Be sure to check out the offerings in the other categories and forums (graded N28, N29, N162 non baseball, graded F50 Yuengling HOFers, tobacco albums, N310 Mayo boxing set, T6 Murad College set, 1887 Goodwin advertising envelope, P2 Sweet Caporal Cobb, 1953 Topps set etc. thanks, Keith

1912 P2 Ty Cobb - Crack in glossy finish to the left of Cobbs eye extending up to the cap insignia, down and to the right ending at Cobb's mouth and to the left ending at the "R" in Detroit. Original back paper insert is factory miscut.
